author: terencechain
content:
I asked that a couple months back and was pointed of this paper: https://arxiv.org/abs/2405.00549
It's algo 5 / section 4
the afety and monotonicity proofs references to section 3
I have not reviewed the proof, but prysm already has this implemented and testing by running on my home server, that's hooked to a Arbitrum one nitro node following the live feed to see how often it reorgs

I have not implemented the latest spec (changes to unrealized justification tracking and start from there etc)
